mil5.1.5:1.2_2: etampi vacanaṁ sakasaṭaṁ saniggahaṁ sadosaṁ ‘hetusamugghāte ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ natthi dibbacakkhussa uppādo’ti sutte vuttaṁ, yadi,
mil5.1.5:1.2_5: tena hi ‘puna dibbacakkhūni uppannānī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.1.5:1.3_1: tena hi ‘sivirājena yācakassa cakkhūni dinnānī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.1.5:1.4_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro veṭhatopi veṭhataro gahanatopi gahanataro,
mil5.1.5:2.2_0: “Api nu kho, bhante nāgasena, hetusamugghāte ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ dibbacakkhu uppajjatī”ti?
mil5.1.5:2.4_2: yena kāraṇena hetusamugghāte ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ dibbacakkhu uppajjati,
mil5.1.5:3.1_0: “Kiṁ pana, mahārāja, atthi loke saccaṁ nāma, yena saccavādino saccakiriyaṁ karontī”ti?
mil5.1.5:3.3_1: yujjati sameti sivirājassa saccabalena dibbacakkhūni uppannānīti,
mil5.1.5:3.3_4: saccaṁyeva tattha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāya.
mil5.1.5:4.1_4: atthi ākāse vassahetu sannicito ‘yena hetunā mahāmegho pavassatī’”ti?
mil5.1.5:4.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, saccaṁyeva tattha hetu bhavati mahato meghassa pavassanāyā”ti.
mil5.1.5:4.3_2: saccaṁ yevettha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāyāti.
mil5.1.5:5.1_2: tesaṁ saha saccamanugītena jalitapajjalitamahāaggikkhandho khaṇena paṭinivattati.
mil5.1.5:5.2_1: atthi tasmiṁ jalitapajjalite mahāaggikkhandhe hetu sannicito ‘yena hetunā jalitapajjalitamahāaggikkhandho khaṇena paṭinivattatī’”ti?
mil5.1.5:5.3_1: saccaṁyeva tattha vatthu hoti tassa jalitapajjalitassa mahāaggikkhandhassa khaṇena paṭinivattanāyā”ti.
mil5.1.5:5.4_2: saccaṁ yevettha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāyāti.
mil5.1.5:6.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, ye keci sattā saccamanugāyanti ‘visaṁ halāhalaṁ agadaṁ bhavatū’ti.
mil5.1.5:6.2_0: Tesaṁ saha saccamanugītena visaṁ halāhalaṁ khaṇena agadaṁ bhavati,
mil5.1.5:6.2_2: atthi tasmiṁ halāhalavise hetu sannicito ‘yena hetunā visaṁ halāhalaṁ khaṇena agadaṁ bhavatī’”ti?
mil5.1.5:6.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, saccaṁyeva tattha hetu bhavati visassa halāhalassa khaṇena paṭighātāyā”ti.
mil5.1.5:6.4_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, vinā pakatihetuṁ saccaṁ yevettha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāyāti.
mil5.1.5:7.1_2: saccaṁ vatthuṁ katvā cattāri ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhantīti.
mil5.1.5:7.2_2: so mahāsamudde kīḷitukāmo catumāse catumāse saccakiriyaṁ katvā saha rathena antomahāsamudde yojanaṁ pavisati,
mil5.1.5:7.2_3: tassa rathasīsassa purato purato mahāvārikkhandho paṭikkamati,
mil5.1.5:7.2_6: so mahāsamuddo sadevamanussenapi lokena pakatikāyabalena sakkā paṭikkamāpetun”ti?
mil5.1.5:7.3_1: taḷāke udakaṁ na sakkā sadevamanussenapi lokena pakatikāyabalena paṭikkamāpetuṁ,
mil5.1.5:7.4_0: “Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena saccabalaṁ ñātabbaṁ ‘natthi taṁ ṭhānaṁ, yaṁ saccena na pattabban’ti.
mil5.1.5:8.1_1: pāṭaliputte asoko dhammarājā sanegamajānapadaamaccabhaṭabalamahāmattehi parivuto gaṅgaṁ nadiṁ navasalilasampuṇṇaṁ
mil5.1.5:8.1_2: samatitthikaṁ sambharitaṁ pañcayojanasatāyāmaṁ yojanaputhulaṁ sandamānaṁ disvā amacce evamāha—
mil5.1.5:8.2_0: ‘atthi koci, bhaṇe, samattho, yo imaṁ mahāgaṅgaṁ paṭisotaṁ sandāpetun’ti.
mil5.1.5:9.1_0: Tasmiṁyeva gaṅgākūle ṭhitā bandhumatī nāma gaṇikā assosi raññā kira evaṁ vuttaṁ—
mil5.1.5:9.2_0: ‘sakkā nu kho imaṁ mahāgaṅgaṁ paṭisotaṁ sandāpetun’ti, sā evamāha—
mil5.1.5:9.3_0: ‘ahañhi nagare pāṭaliputte gaṇikā rūpūpajīvinī antimajīvikā, mama tāva rājā saccakiriyaṁ passatū’ti.
mil5.1.5:9.4_1: saha tassā saccakiriyāya khaṇena sā mahāgaṅgā gaḷagaḷāyantī paṭisotaṁ sandittha mahato janakāyassa passato.
mil5.1.5:10.1_0: Atha rājā gaṅgāya āvaṭṭaūmivegajanitaṁ halāhalasaddaṁ sutvā vimhito acchariyabbhutajāto amacce evamāha—
mil5.1.5:10.3_1: gaṇikā tava vacanaṁ sutvā saccakiriyaṁ akāsi,
mil5.1.5:11.1_0: Atha saṁviggahadayo rājā turitaturito sayaṁ gantvā taṁ gaṇikaṁ pucchi—
mil5.1.5:11.2_0: ‘saccaṁ kira, je, tayā saccakiriyāya ayaṁ gaṅgā paṭisotaṁ sandāpitā’ti?
mil5.1.5:11.5_1: ko vā te vacanaṁ ādiyati anummatto,
mil5.1.5:11.5_2: kena tvaṁ balena imaṁ mahāgaṅgaṁ paṭisotaṁ sandāpesī’ti?
mil5.1.5:11.9_0: ‘kiṁ te saccabalaṁ atthi coriyā dhuttiyā asatiyā chinnikāya pāpiyā bhinnasīlāya hiriatikkantikāya andhajanapalobhikāyā’ti.
mil5.1.5:11.12_0: ‘katamā pana sā hoti saccakiriyā, iṅgha maṁ sāvehī’ti.
mil5.1.5:11.13_1: dhanaṁ deti khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā añño vā koci,
mil5.1.5:11.13_5: anunayappaṭighavippamuttā dhanassāmikaṁ paricarāmi, esā me, deva,
mil5.1.5:12.1_0: Itipi, mahārāja, sacce ṭhitā na kiñci atthaṁ na vindanti.
mil5.1.5:12.4_0: ‘maṁsacakkhusmiṁ naṭṭhe ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ natthi dibbacakkhussa uppādo’ti.
mil5.1.5:12.5_0: Taṁ bhāvanāmayaṁ cakkhuṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, evametaṁ, mahārāja, dhārehī”ti.
